title: Android 12L’s final release removes the ‘show touches’ option for screen recorder on Pixel
content:
Google officially launched Android 12L yesterday with a focus on big screens, but also a bunch of new features and tweaks for existing Pixel smartphones. In Android 12L’s final release, though, the “show touches” option for the screen recorder on Pixel devices is missing.

more…

The post Android 12L’s final release removes the ‘show touches’ option for screen recorder on Pixel appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has unexpectedly removed the "show touches" option from the built-in screen recorder on Android 12L, a big loss for Pixel phones.
